amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to implement the final rule regarding energy efficient standards for certain subsidized housing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1237 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 267.

action.text: Amendment SA 1237 proposed by Senator Graham for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5168) To prohibit the use of funds to implement the final rule regarding energy efficient standards for certain subsidized housing.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1237 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 267.
